description: Functions with caching, memoization, and performance optimization

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getExpensiveData" cache="true" cache-ttl="300">
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM large_table" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Result is cached for 300 seconds (5 minutes)

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getUserData" cache="true" cache-ttl="600">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM users WHERE id = {id}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Each unique parameter set cached separately for 10 minutes
Short cache for near-realtime data (30 seconds)

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getConfig" cache="true" cache-ttl="86400">
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM config" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Cached for 24 hours (86400 seconds) for rarely-changing data

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="fetchData" cache="true" cache-ttl="300">
  <q:param name="id" type="string" required="true" />
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM data WHERE id = {id}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Caches query result per unique id for 5 minutes

expected_output.quantum_code:
<q:function name="getUserDashboard" cache="true" cache-ttl="180">
  <q:return value="SELECT * FROM user_dashboard WHERE user_id = {session.userId}" />
</q:function>
expected_output.runtime_behavior: Each user's dashboard cached separately for 3 minutes
